type.name: org.gradle.api.plugins.quality.CheckstyleExtension
type.description:
Configuration options for the Checkstyle plugin.
@see CheckstylePlugin

method.name: getConfig
method.description: The Checkstyle configuration to use. Replaces the configFile property. @since 2.2

method.name: getConfigFile
method.description: The Checkstyle configuration file to use.

method.name: getConfigProperties
method.description: The properties available for use in the configuration file. These are substituted into the configuration file.

method.name: isShowViolations
method.description:
Whether or not rule violations are to be displayed on the console. Defaults to <tt>true</tt>.
Example: showViolations = false

method.name: setConfigFile
method.description: The Checkstyle configuration file to use.

property.name: config
property.description: The Checkstyle configuration to use. Replaces the configFile property. @since 2.2

property.name: configFile
property.description: The Checkstyle configuration file to use.

property.name: configProperties
property.description: The properties available for use in the configuration file. These are substituted into the configuration file.

property.name: showViolations
property.description:
Whether or not rule violations are to be displayed on the console. Defaults to <tt>true</tt>.
Example: showViolations = false
